name: DocSchema
description: Open standard for AI-readable document extraction schemas. Browse 100+ document types across 33 countries and 5 business verticals.

tools.name: list_verticals
tools.description: List all DocSchema business verticals with their stats (document type count, entity type count, country, and slug identifier).

tools.name: get_stats
tools.description: Get aggregate statistics for the DocSchema standard: total verticals, document types, entity types, and defined fields.

tools.name: get_document_types
tools.description: Get all document type definitions for a specific vertical. Pass the vertical slug.

tools.name: get_document_schema
tools.description: Get the complete JSON Schema for a specific document type within a vertical.

tools.name: get_entity_types
tools.description: Get all entity type definitions for a vertical including data sources, field mappings, and conditional requirements.

tools.name: get_full_config
tools.description: Get the complete raw DocSchema configuration JSON for a vertical.

tools.name: list_countries
tools.description: List all countries in the DocSchema document library with document counts, country codes, names, and flags.

tools.name: get_documents_by_country
tools.description: Get all document type schemas for a specific country. Pass a 2-letter ISO country code.

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Search for document types across all countries by name, description, or ID.

query.description: Search query to match against document name, description, or ID

tools.name: get_document_detail
tools.description: Get the complete JSON Schema for a specific document from the document library.

tools.name: get_doc_library_stats
tools.description: Get aggregate statistics for the document library: total countries and total document schemas.
